questions.text: What other classic movie musical starred both Shirley Jones and Gordon MacRae?
questions.explanation:
Carousel.

	MacRae replaced the originally cast Frank Sinatra in the role of Billy Bigelow, after Sinatra opted not to do the film.

questions.text: What is the name of the song sung by Jud that was cut from the movie?
Who choreographed 'Oklahoma!'?
Who played the peddler man?
How many Academy Awards did 'Oklahoma!' win?
questions.explanation:
Two.

	The movie won Best Score and Best Sound. It was also nominated for Best Colour Cinematography and best film editing.

questions.text: Who is the one female star of 'Oklahoma!' that was still alive at the beginning of the 21st century?
How did Jud die at the end of the movie?
options: He burned up in the haystack
questions.explanation:
He fell on his knife.

	Curly jumped off the haystack and fell on Jud, who was knocked over onto his own knife.

questions.text: How much money did Will need in order to get permission to marry Ado Annie?
Who directed 'Oklahoma!'?
Finish this line: Everything's up to date in ____________?
What is the name of the story that 'Oklahoma!' is based on?
questions.explanation:
Green Grow The Lilacs.

	'Oklahoma!' was based on a story by Lynn Riggs called 'Green Grow the Lilacs'.
